summary:
I feel so naughty, pining here.
For your happy face is guidance.
descriptionHtml:
Upload in progress

Yeah, it\'s as simple as this;

I put a plank of wood with the face of Plank from Ed, Edd & Eddy into the game. He\'s out by the wreck of the Brinehammer, north east along the coast near Solitude.

Just a silly item. Nothing more. No fancy spell, no fancy script, just an item.

EDIT: 

Added an optional file where Plank is a weapon. Pick him up, take him to a forge, provide 4 iron ingots, 3 leather strips, and Plank, and boom. Crafted under Iron, requires Firewood to temper. Can be un-crafted in the Misc tab of the forge, and also lets you turn Plank into Firewood. But seriously, who\'d turn Plank into Firewood? You\'d be a bad birch for doing that!
author: Campaigner
